title: BungeeCord(waterfall)两个waterfall端进行公网跨服问题
txt_content:
如题
我使用两台主机都用waterfall进行公网跨服，从一个子服跳转到另一个子服会提示
the sever you were previoysly on went down you have been connected to a fallback sever
